LanguageData.VWE_Quickdraw.label: dégainer rapidement
LanguageData.VWE_Quickdraw.description: Vous apprend à fabriquer des armes légères et rapides à dégainer pour tirer.

VWE_Quickdraw.generalRules.rulesStrings.li: subject_story->mastered the art of weapon design for speed, crafting firearms that are as swift to engage as they are lethal
subject_story->engineered mechanisms that minimize draw time, ensuring that readiness and rapid response define every encounter
subject_gerund->shaping the future of combat with the quicksilver grace of rapid deployment
